entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Multiple Browser Tabs, Keeping Authentication State in Sync #56473
  • Push minified .js files to submodule #56472
    9.0-preview7
  • TS/JS Warnings after creating a .NET 8 ASP.NET Core Web App #56471
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #56469
  • Perf improvement: json, multiple_queries, single_query #56468
  • TCPStats and QuicStats returned by Http Sys IHttpSysRequestInfoFeature is only returning cached results #56467
  • Unexpected DOM persistence: Omitted attributes not removed during re-render #56463
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot #56462

Closed

  • Memory leak in ASP.NET Core 8 #56465
  • MSAL : Azure B2C Blazor wasm fails after 24 hours when the refresh token has been expired #48506
    8.0.x
  • Adding custom events does not work as expected in Blazor #56458
    9.0-rc1
  • Perf improvement: json, json #56461
  • Unit test projects with JsonSerializerIsReflectionEnabledByDefault=false cannot use WebApplicationFactory #55586
  • Enhanced Navigation doesn't reprocess JS on Same Page #55119
  • Blazor: Updating from 8.0.4 to 8.0.5 silently crashed our webapp due to caching of dotnet.js #55751
  • object property causes build crash when generating OpenAPI document at build time #56351
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.5.24277.8] Fail to publish react project with error message "The ResolvedCompressedAssessts" task failed unexpectedly. #56288
    9.0-preview6
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/2.1` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #56452
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #56374
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #56454
  • Update version of IdentityModel to >= 7.4.0 for 9.x #54518
    9.0-preview6

PullRequests

Created

  • Set readOnly status for properties and support OpenApiServers #56470
    area-mvc
  • Set OpenAPI discriminators for JSON polymorphic types #56466
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Merged

  • Use JSON source generator in WebApplicationFactory #55595
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview7
  • Fix up nullability and primitive type handing in schema generation #56372
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview7
  • Only enable SwaggerUI in development #56455
    area-grpc, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Add logging to MVC tests #55592
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun
  • Annotate SignalR server for native AOT #56460
    area-signalr
  • Add .NET Standard 2.0 TFM to WebUtilities and Headers #52801
    area-networking
  • [release/6.0] Bump to macos-12 build image #56273
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • Optimize RouteTableFactory.DetectAmbiguous routes #56415
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add overloads for problem and validation problem results that accept `IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<,>>` #56368
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Set the baggage even when the trace id is not successfully extracted #55341
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Chain runtime .Msi's instead of .Exe's in hosting bundle #56459
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Use Convert.ToHexStringLower() #56235
    community-contribution, area-security, 9.0-preview7
  • Add OpenAPI operation and schema transformer interfaces #56395
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks
  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException Throw methods in SendFileResponseExtensions..CheckRange #56420
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Bump to macos-12 build image #56270
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Fixed LDAP nested group claims #55707
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security
  • Fix ProjectTemplate build steps with new JDK #56199
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Perf: ReasonPhrases as FrozenDictionary instead of Dictionary #56304
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.7.24323.5 #56421
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
